name: Mercedes-Benz S-Class
description: The price of Mercedes-Benz S-Class, a 5 seater Sedan, ranges from Rs. 1.77  - 1.86 Crore. It is available in 2 variants, with engine options ranging from 2925 to 2999 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. S-Class comes with 10 airbags. Mercedes-Benz S-Class is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 12.82 kmpl for S-Class.

variants.variant_name: S-Class S 350d 2925 cc, Diesel, Automatic (TC), 282 bhp
S-Class S 450 4MATIC 2999 cc, Petrol, Automatic (TC), 12.82 kmpl, 362 bhp
